Belisario [arr. Round]
Altrincham, Cheshire Promoted by Altrincham Borough Brass Band Best cornet - Goodshaw. Best trombone - Bolton Borough. Best soprano - Westhoughton Old. Prizes: £10, £5, £3, £2, £1 7 bands competed.
